涂抹肥皂；用肥皂清洗（物体表面）；<俚>对…拍马屁

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 涂着肥皂的；含有肥皂的；似肥皂的；圆滑的

bilingual.source: What do you think of soap operas?
Then what do you think of soap operas?
bilingual.target: 那么你觉得肥皂剧怎么样？
我们需要买更多的肥皂。
你能给我递一下肥皂吗？

list.abstract: SOAP（英 [səʊp]，美 [soʊp]），英语单词，作名词为肥皂；肥皂剧。作动词为用肥皂洗。短语搭配有soap opera（肥皂剧）。例句为“Washing hands with soap is good for public health.（用肥皂洗手有益于公众健康。）” SOAP相关近义词有savon。
soap（Simple Object Access Protocol）即简单对象访问协议，是一种标准化的通讯规范，主要用于Web服务（web service）中。 它基于已经广泛使用的HTTP和XML协议，是第一个没有发明任何新技术的技术。

yingyinNormal.en: A soap opera roof party?! I'm going to a soap opera roof party! Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
yingyinNormal.zh: 肥皂剧屋顶派对！我要参加肥皂剧屋顶派对！喔，我的天啊！好了，发泄完了。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you wash your hands? With soap? Did you dry them?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你洗手了吗？用肥皂了吗？擦干了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Kick ass! Oh, God. We have to celebrate. You know we should do like a soap opera theme.
yingyinNormal.zh: 了不起。敬乔伊。那我们必须要庆祝，应该开个肥皂剧主题派对。

yingyinNormal.en: But Joey, you're gonna be fine. You don't need that show. It was just a dumb soap opera.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔伊，你不会有事的，你不需要那个节目，那只是个蠢的肥皂剧嘛。

yingyinNormal.en: I know. I know. It'd be so great if I got this because you never know what could happen on a soap.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道我能够得到这份工作是最好的，因为谁都不知道演肥皂剧结果会怎么样。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, that's gonna get you into Soap Opera Digest. Well I would just like to say that Joey truly has enriched the days of our lives.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可以上《肥皂剧文摘》，我想说乔伊真的丰富了我们的生活。

yingyinNormal.en: What if she likes the people who work there more than us? She already likes soap bubbles more than us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 万一她对托儿所员工的喜爱胜过我们怎么办？她对肥皂泡泡的喜爱已经胜过我们了。

yingyinNormal.en: I've been out here three months, and all I've gotten is a couple of national commercials and this recurring thing on a soap.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在这里待了足足三个月，结果只搞到几个全国广告还有肥皂剧的小客串。

yingyinNormal.en: That's what you brought? Potatoes? No, that would be a stereotypical ignorant cliché. I also brought our national soap.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你就带了这个，土豆？当然不是了，那样多老套啊。我还带了我们的国民肥皂。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, it must be one of those closed-circuit hospital channels. No, no. That's a soap opera. This is a very dramatic hospital.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那一定是医院里的闭路电视系统。不，那是肥皂剧。这是家充满戏剧性的医院。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, you'll be happy to know that if you wash your hands properly with soap, nearly all traces of bacteria will be removed, regardless of how you dry them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其实无论你怎么擦干手，只要用肥皂洗手，几乎细菌就会一干二净。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, how much? Two thousand dollars? Two thousand dollars? What do you think I am, a soap opera star? Yeah. That's right, I am.
yingyinNormal.zh: 多少钱呢？两千块。两千块？你以为我是谁？肥皂剧明星吗？是啊。没错，我就是。

yingyinNormal.en: That's the only authentic thing that's been said today. We all need to dig deeper than potatoes and soap and stupid hats.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是今天说的唯一真实的事情。我们都需要挖出比土豆、肥皂以及愚蠢的帽子更深层的东西。

yingyinNormal.en: By moving on, do you mean she's going out with other men and you spent the afternoon making 15th-century soap with Wolowitz?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你说过去了的意思是不是指当她和另外一个男人约会的时候，你却整个下午都在和沃罗威茨做十五世纪的肥皂？

yingyinNormal.en: You know, it's nice to spend time with people who don't talk about work like it's some kind of soap opera. Jennifer still trying to sleep her way to the top? Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 跟你们一起待着感觉真好，你们才不会把工作当成肥皂剧讨论。珍妮佛还在尝试一路"睡"上去吗？是的。

yingyinNormal.en: That was not 15th century soap. My god, those people need to learn you can't just put "ye olde" in front of anything you want and expect to get away with it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那不是十五世纪的肥皂，我的天呐，那些人必须得学学不是在一样东西名字前加上"老"字[仿古字] 就能冒充古老的东西了。

yingyinNormal.en: What kind of smell? I don't know. Soap?
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么怪味？不晓得，香皂味？

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, you're roommate is a soap opera star. Your character is in a coma.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的室友是连续剧明星。你的角色在昏迷中。

yingyinNormal.en: First, I need some water. Then, the soap. And now, the tennis racket, please. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，我需要一些水。加洗洁精。然后把旧网球拍给我！谢谢！

yingyinNormal.en: George, bring me my old tennis racket. A bucket, some soap, a tennis racket. What is Daddy Pig doing?
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治，把我的旧网球拍拿来。水桶，洗洁精，旧网球拍，猪爸爸他要做什么？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 公共演说者做临时演讲台的箱子；给人们提供公开发表言论机会的事物；肥皂箱

examination_example.sentence: My mother was putting her groceries into shopping bags when a stranger came up to her,  handing her  the <highlight>soap</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我母亲正在把她的杂货放进购物袋，这时一个陌生人走到她面前，递给她肥皂。

examination_example.sentence: A bottle of rubbing alcohol (医用酒精) and a bar of <highlight>soap</highlight>.
Because <highlight>soaps</highlight> and other wastes can harm waterways, be careful your washing water doesn't pollute the sea lakes and rivers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为肥皂和其他废物会损害水道，所以要小心你的洗涤水不要污染海洋湖泊和河流。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Foreign books and <highlight>soap</highlight> operas are good, but Chinese writers and actors are just as good.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 外国书籍和肥皂剧很好，但中国作家和演员也很好。

examination_example.sentence: Washing hands with <highlight>soap</highlight> is good for public health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 用肥皂洗手有益于公众健康。

examination_example.sentence: However, washing hands with <highlight>soap</highlight> does not happen as often as you might think.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，用肥皂洗手并不像你想象的那么频繁。

examination_example.sentence: Turn the tap off while you <highlight>soap</highlight> your hands or brush your teeth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你用肥皂洗手或刷牙时，把水龙头关掉。
